data.message: Hi, i just problem to like fanpage just popup to "Your attempt to become a fan was not successful.Please try again....."  and can't like to all site fanpage facebook. would u can help me please.

replies.message: We hear your frustrations, Luk.  We’re working hard to improve the Facebook experience. Please help us track any issues with liking fanpages by reporting them in the Help Center. http://on.fb.me/18dEFaD -Sarah
Pwede mg ask? wr ur place?

Please, please, please help me.  I am unable to load Farmville2 for the last week.  My crops are shrivled, livestock not fed, and I have not been able to send crops to my co-op.  I am so feustrated I could scream.  This is the only game with which I am having trouble.  Please help/  Thank you, Lynelle Arabie(Arabie Farms).

Hey Lynelle. Apps and games are managed by developers outside of Facebook. If you need help with an app or game, contact its developer directly. You can use this link to contact the developers of games you like to play: https://www.facebook.com/help/www/149151751822041 -Hailey
